name: Stock Update for WC
author: Pawan Priyadarshi

sections.description:
Don’t waste time in uploading the stock/inventory values on store manually. This plugin enables you store manager
to update the stock values in a matter of seconds.

  • Want to update just few products in less interval? Enter SKU and stock value and that’s it.

  • You will send an email notification each time the stock gets updated. It will reduce the possiblity of any errors.

  • Inventory backups will be stored on your server, so that you won’t loose any data.

Buy Our Plugins- (https://endroit.in/)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

Does it only work with woocommerce?

Yes, It only works with woocommerce.

How can I get support for this plugin if there is an issue?

Please share your issue with screenshots and we will try to resolve the issues within 2-3 business days.

How can I donate for this plugin?

Please Donate on my PayPal link- https://paypal.me/PawanPriyadarshi?locale.x=en_GB
